43 #ifndef KALMAN_FILTER_INCLUDE
44 #define KALMAN_FILTER_INCLUDE
45 
46 #include <map>
47 #include <string>
48 #include <sstream>
49 #include "Exception.hpp"
50 #include "Vector.hpp"
51 #include "Matrix.hpp"
52 #include "Namelist.hpp"
53 #include "SRIFilter.hpp"
54 #include "logstream.hpp"
55 
56 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
57 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
58 // A base class for implementing Kalman filter using SRIFilter. Define a class with
59 // this class as base, implement some or all the virtual functions to define problem.
60 //
61 // The derived class MUST overload:
62 // virtual int defineInitial() to define initial time and apriori state and cov.
63 // virtual int defineMeasurements() to define Partials, data and meas.covariance.
64 // virtual void defineTimestep() to define Phi, G, Rw and Control
65 //
66 // The derived class MAY overload these, if the state will be modified on the fly:
67 // virtual int defineAddsDrops() to define an initial SRI for states to be added
68 // and to define a Namelist of states to be removed. This routine is called
69 // three times, before the MU, between the MU and the TU, and after the TU.
70 // If it returns -1, it does nothing (this allows the caller to skip an epoch).
71 //
72 // The derived class may want to overload the output() routine.
73 // The Update routines may be overloaded if necessary (but it shouldn't be).
74 //
75 // How to use the derived class:
76 // 1. Define all the 'define' functions; this constitutes the filter design.
77 //
78 // 2. create the filter, using either empty c'tor and Reset(Namelist), or c'tor(NL)
79 //
80 // 3. initialize the filter by calling initializeFilter() (calls defineInitial())
81 //
82 // 4. call ForwardFilter(finalTime); which increment time and NTU (from 0),
83 // until time reaches finalTime.
84 // This routine is a loop over time; the loop consists of:
85 //
86 // KalmanAddsDrops(), which calls
87 // defineAddsDrops(1,...) to get any new states (an SRI) to be added
88 // or states to be dropped (a Namelist).
89 //
90 // KalmanMeasurementUpdate(), which calls
91 // defineMeasurements() to get current time, data, mcov, and partials
92 // NB. defineMeasurements() controls the time steps.
93 //
94 // KalmanAddsDrops(), calling defineAddsDrops(2,...)
95 //
96 // KalmanTimeUpdate(), which calls
97 // defineTimestep() to get Phi,Rw,G,Control
98 //
99 // KalmanAddsDrops(), calling defineAddsDrops(3,...)
100 //
101 // Several switches may be used to control the filter. For each there is also a 'set'
102 // routine.
103 // 1. setDoOutput(false) turns off the output routine.
104 // 2. setDoInvert(false) stops inversions (compute State and Cov from the SRI) and
105 // output during the forward filter. NB. cf. setSRISU for the backward filter.
106 //
107 class KalmanFilter {
108 public:
109 
110  // enum to define the current filter operation, mostly for output()
111  typedef enum FilterStageEnum {
112  Unknown=0,
113  Init,
114  AD1, AD2, AD3,
115  TU,
116  MU,
117  SU,
118  StageCount
119  } FilterStage;
120 
121  // enum to define the return values for defineMeasurements()
122  typedef enum KalmanMUReturnValuesEnum {
123  Process=0,
124  ProcessThenQuit,
125  SkipThisEpoch,
126  SkipThenQuit,
127  QuitImmediately,
128  ReturnCount
129  } KalmanReturn;
130 
131  // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
132  // 1. Define all the 'define' functions; this constitutes the filter design; these
133  // get information from the user and MUST be implemented in the derived class.
134  // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
135  //
143  virtual int defineInitial(double& T0, gpstk::Vector<double>& X,
144  gpstk::Matrix<double>& Cov)
145  throw(gpstk::Exception) = 0;
146 
158  virtual KalmanReturn defineMeasurements(double& T,
159  const gpstk::Vector<double>& X,
160  const gpstk::Matrix<double>& Cov,
161  const bool useFlag,
162  gpstk::Matrix<double>& Partials,
163  gpstk::Vector<double>& Data,
164  gpstk::Matrix<double>& MCov)
165  throw(gpstk::Exception) = 0;
166 
169  virtual void defineTimestep(const double T, const double DT,
170  const gpstk::Vector<double>& State,
171  const gpstk::Matrix<double>& Cov,
172  const bool useFlag,
173  gpstk::Matrix<double>& PhiInv,
174  gpstk::Matrix<double>& G,
175  gpstk::Matrix<double>& Rw,
176  gpstk::Vector<double>& Control)
177  throw(gpstk::Exception) = 0;
178 
187  virtual int defineAddsDrops(int which, const double T,
188  gpstk::SRI& aSRI,
189  gpstk::Namelist& dNL)
190  throw(gpstk::Exception)
191  { aSRI = gpstk::SRI(); dNL.clear(); return -1; }
192 
193  // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
194  // 2. create the filter, using either the empty c'tor followed by Reset(Namelist),
195  // or the c'tor(Namelist), giving an initial Namelist for the filter state.
196 
198  KalmanFilter(void)
199  : NTU(0),NMU(-1),Nstate(0),stage(Unknown),Nnoise(0),
200  extended(false),smoother(false),doSRISU(false),
201  doOutput(true),doInversions(true),singular(true)
202  { }
203 
205  KalmanFilter(const gpstk::Namelist& NL)
206  { initialize(NL); }
207 
209  void Reset(const gpstk::Namelist& NL)
210  throw()
211  { initialize(NL); }
212 
213  // destructor
214  virtual ~KalmanFilter(void) {};
215 
216  // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
218  virtual void initializeFilter(void) throw(gpstk::Exception)
219  {
220  try {
221  double T;
222 
223  int isInfo;
224  gpstk::Vector<double> initX;
225  gpstk::Matrix<double> initCov; // may be info or cov
226 
227  isInfo = defineInitial(T, initX, initCov);
228  time = T;
229  stage = Init;
230 
231  try {
232  if(isInfo == -1) {
233  srif.addAPrioriInformation(initCov,initX);
234  Invert(std::string("Invert after adding a priori info"));
235  }
236  else if(isInfo == 1) {
237  srif.addAPriori(initCov,initX);
238  // this assumes srif was 0 before addAPriori....
239  Cov = initCov;
240  State = initX;
241  inverted = true;
242  }
243  else { // returned zero
244  State = initX;
245  Cov = initCov;
246  inverted = false;
247  }
248  }
249  catch(gpstk::Exception& e) {
250  e.addText("Failed to add apriori");
251  GPSTK_RETHROW(e);
252  }
253 
254  if(inverted && doOutput) output(NTU);
255  }
256  catch(gpstk::Exception& e) {
257  e.addText("initializeFilter");
258  GPSTK_RETHROW(e);
259  }
260  }
261 
262  // -------------------------------------------------------------
270  virtual void ForwardFilter(const double finalT, const double filterDT)
271  throw(gpstk::Exception)
272  {
273  int iret;
274  try {
275  // forward filter: loop over time
276  while(time <= finalT) {
277 
278  // ------------------------------------------------------------
279  // MOD 1: add new state and drop states from the last iteration
280  // Calls defineAddsDrops(1,time,addsSRI,dropsNL,(any drops here?))
281  iret = KalmanAddsDrops(1,time);
282 
283  if(iret) {
284  stage = AD1;
285  Invert(std::string("Invert after add/drop states"));
286  if(doOutput) output(NTU);
287  }
288 
289  // ------------------------------------------------------------
290  // MU: returns 0: Process : ok, process normally
291  // 1: ProcessThenQuit : quit after this data,
292  // 2: SkipThisEpoch : don't process this data, but proceed
293  // 3: SkipThenQuit : skip this data, and then quit
294  // 4: QuitImmediately : stop now
295  // This defines nexttime as the next available data epoch.
296  double nexttime = time;
297  KalmanReturn ret = KalmanMeasurementUpdate(nexttime);
298  if(ret == QuitImmediately)
299  break;
300  // else Skip
301  // else SkipThenQuit
302  else if(ret == Process || ret == ProcessThenQuit) {
303  stage = MU;
304 
305  if(doInversions) {
306  Invert(std::string("Invert after MU"));
307  if(doOutput) output(NMU);
308  }
309  }
310 
311  // ------------------------------------------------------------
312  // MOD 2: add new state and drop states from the last iteration
313  // Calls defineAddsDrops(2,time,addsSRI,dropsNL,(any drops here?))
314  iret = KalmanAddsDrops(2,time);
315 
316  if(iret) {
317  stage = AD2;
318  Invert(std::string("Invert after add/drop states"));
319  if(doOutput) output(NTU);
320  }
321 
322  // compute next timestep
323  double deltaT = nexttime - time;
324  if(deltaT > 1.5*filterDT) deltaT=filterDT;
325 
326  // ------------------------------------------------------------
327  // TU. this will update time by deltaT
328  KalmanTimeUpdate(time,deltaT);
329  stage = TU;
330 
331  if(doInversions) {
332  Invert(std::string("Invert after TU"));
333  if(doOutput) output(NTU);
334  }
335 
336  // ------------------------------------------------------------
337  // MOD 3: add new state and drop states from the last iteration
338  // Calls defineAddsDrops(3,time,addsSRI,dropsNL,(any drops here?))
339  iret = KalmanAddsDrops(3,time);
340 
341  if(iret) {
342  stage = AD3;
343  Invert(std::string("Invert after add/drop states"));
344  if(doOutput) output(NTU);
345  }
346 
347  if(ret == ProcessThenQuit || ret == SkipThenQuit) break;
348 
349  } // end loop over forward filter
350  }
351  catch(gpstk::Exception& e) {
352  e.addText("ForwardFilter");
353  GPSTK_RETHROW(e);
354  }
355  }
356 
357  // -------------------------------------------------------------
360  virtual void output(int N) throw()
361  {
362  int i;
363  std::ostringstream oss;
364 
365  if(stage == Unknown) {
366  LOG(ERROR) << "Kalman stage not defined in output().";
367  return;
368  }
369 
370  // if MU or SU, output the namelist first
371  // TD make verbose
372  if(stage == MU || stage == SU) {
373  oss << (stage==MU ? "KNL" : "KSL") << msg << " "
374  << std::fixed << N << " " << std::setprecision(3) << time;
375  gpstk::Namelist NL = srif.getNames();
376  for(i=0; i<NL.size(); i++)
377  oss << std::setw(10) << NL.getName(i);
378 
379  LOG(INFO) << oss.str();
380  oss.str("");
381  }
382 
383  // output a label
384  switch(stage) {
385  case Init: oss << "KIN"; break;
386  case AD1:
387  case AD2:
388  case AD3: oss << "KAD"; break;
389  case TU: oss << "KTU"; break;
390  case MU: oss << "KMU"; break;
391  case SU: oss << "KSU"; break;
392  default:
393  case Unknown:
394  LOG(INFO) << "Kalman stage not defined." << std::endl;
395  return;
396  }
397  oss << msg << " ";
398 
399  // output the time
400  oss << std::fixed << N << " " << std::setprecision(3) << time;
401 
402  // output the state
403  for(i=0; i<State.size(); i++)
404  oss << " " << std::setw(9) << State(i);
405 
406  // output sqrt of diagonal covariance elements
407  oss << std::scientific << std::setprecision(2);
408  for(i=0; i<State.size(); i++)
409  oss << " " << std::setw(10) << (singular ? 0.0 : sqrt(Cov(i,i)));
410 
411  LOG(INFO) << oss.str();
412  }
413 
414  // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
415  // The support routines
416  // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
419  virtual int KalmanAddsDrops(int which, double T)
420  throw(gpstk::Exception)
421  {
422  try {
423  gpstk::SRI addsSRI, dropSRI;
424  gpstk::Namelist addsNL;
425 
426  // get new adds and drops from the caller
427  int iret = defineAddsDrops(which, T, addsSRI, dropsNL);
428  if(iret < 0) return 0; // skip this epoch
429  iret = 0;
430 
431 
432  // drop states that were found in the last iteration
433  if(dropsNL.size() > 0) {
434  LOG(DEBUG) << "KalmanAddsDrops(" << which << ") drops " << dropsNL;
435 
436  gpstk::Namelist saveNL(srif.getNames());
437 
438  // get state without inverting information matrix
439  int i,k,nsingular;
440  gpstk::Vector<double> X;
441  try {
442  srif.getState(X, &nsingular);
443  }
444  catch(gpstk::MatrixException& me) {
445  for(k=0; k<dropsNL.size(); k++) {
446  i = saveNL.index(dropsNL.getName(k));
447  if(nsingular == -1 || i < nsingular) {
448  gpstk::Exception e("Cannot drop states; problem is singular");
449  GPSTK_THROW(e);
450  }
451  }
452  }
453 
454  //LOG(INFO) << "SRIF before drops:\n" << std::fixed
455  // << std::setprecision(5) << std::setw(10) << srif;
456  //LOG(INFO) << "State before drops:\n" << std::fixed
457  // << std::setprecision(5) << std::setw(10) << X;
458 
459  // fill a vector of drop states
460  gpstk::Vector<double> dropStates(dropsNL.size());
461  for(k=0; k<dropsNL.size(); k++) {
462  i = saveNL.index(dropsNL.getName(k));
463  dropStates(k) = X(i);
464  }
465 
466  //LOG(DEBUG) << "Drops states are " << std::fixed << std::setprecision(5)
467  // << std::setw(10) << dropStates;
468 
469  srif.stateFix(dropsNL, dropStates);
470 
471  //LOG(DEBUG) << "srif after drops:\n" << std::scientific
472  // << std::setprecision(5) << std::setw(10) << srif;
473 
474  iret += dropsNL.size();
475  }
476 
477  if(addsSRI.size() > 0) {
478  LOG(DEBUG) << "KalmanAddsDrops(" << which << ") adds "
479  << addsSRI.getNames();
480 
481  // check that addsNL and srif have no states in common
482  if((addsNL & srif.getNames()).size() > 0) {
483  gpstk::Exception e("Adding a state that is already present");
484  GPSTK_THROW(e);
485  }
486 
487  //LOG(DEBUG) << "srif before adds:\n" << std::fixed
488  // << std::setprecision(5) << std::setw(10) << srif;
489 
490  // append addsSRI onto end
491  srif.append(addsSRI);
492 
493  iret += addsSRI.size();
494 
495  //LOG(DEBUG) << "srif after adds:\n" << std::fixed
496  // << std::setprecision(5) << std::setw(10) << srif;
497  }
498 
499  return iret;
500  }
501  catch(gpstk::Exception& e) {
502  e.addText("KADD");
503  GPSTK_RETHROW(e);
504  }
505  }
506 
507  // -------------------------------------------------------------
510  virtual KalmanReturn KalmanMeasurementUpdate(double& T)
511  throw(gpstk::Exception)
512  {
513  try {
514  gpstk::Matrix<double> Partials, MCov;
515  gpstk::Vector<double> Data;
516 
517  // 0: ok, 1: quit after this data, 2: skip, 3: quit now
518  // TD replace with enum
519  // Pass in T=current, return T=next data epoch;
520  // if next > curr + filterDT, this should return 2 so TU will catch up
521  KalmanReturn ret = defineMeasurements(T, State, Cov, !singular && inverted,
522  Partials, Data, MCov);
523 
524  PFResid = gpstk::Vector<double>(0);
525  if(ret == Process || ret == ProcessThenQuit) {
526  if(extended)
527  srif.zeroState();
528  // NB. derived class must update reference trajectory
529 
530  srif.measurementUpdate(Partials, Data, MCov);
531  PFResid = Data;
532  inverted = false;
533  NMU++;
534  }
535 
536 
537  return ret;
538  }
539  catch(gpstk::Exception& e) {
540  e.addText("KMU");
541  GPSTK_RETHROW(e);
542  }
543  }
544 
545  // -------------------------------------------------------------
547  virtual void KalmanTimeUpdate(double T, double DT) throw(gpstk::Exception)
548  {
549  try {
550  gpstk::Vector<double> Control, Zw;
551  gpstk::Matrix<double> PhiInv, G, Rw;
552 
553  time += DT;
554  defineTimestep(time, DT, State, Cov, !singular && inverted,
555  PhiInv, G, Rw, Control);
556 
557  Nnoise = Rw.rows(); // Nnoise is member, but temporary
558  Zw = gpstk::Vector<double>(Nnoise);
559 
560  // control
561  if(Control.size() > 0) {
562  srif.shift(-PhiInv*Control);
563  }
564 
565  if(isSmoother()) { // save for smoother
566  // timeUpdate will trash these
567  PhiInvStore[NTU] = PhiInv;
568  GStore[NTU] = G;
569  if(Control.size() > 0) ControlStore[NTU] = Control;
570  }
571 
572  Zw = 0.0; // yes this is necessary
573  gpstk::Matrix<double> Rwx(Nnoise,Nstate,0.0);
574  srif.timeUpdate(PhiInv, Rw, G, Zw, Rwx);
575  inverted = false;
576 
577  if(isSmoother()) { // save for smoother
578  // indexing is 0...NTU-1
579  RwStore[NTU] = Rw;
580  RwxStore[NTU] = Rwx;
581  ZwStore[NTU] = Zw;
582  TimeStore[NTU] = time;
583  }
584 
585  NTU++;
586  }
587  catch(gpstk::Exception& e) {
588  e.addText("KTU");
589  GPSTK_RETHROW(e);
590  }
591  }
592 
593  // -------------------------------------------------------------
595  virtual void KalmanSmootherUpdate(void) throw(gpstk::Exception)
596  {
597  try {
598  NTU--;
599 
600  //LOG(DEBUG) << " SU at " << NTU << " with state " << srif.getNames();
601  gpstk::Matrix<double> Rw = RwStore[NTU];
602  gpstk::Matrix<double> Rwx = RwxStore[NTU];
603  gpstk::Matrix<double> PhiInv = PhiInvStore[NTU];
604  gpstk::Matrix<double> G = GStore[NTU];
605  gpstk::Vector<double> Zw = ZwStore[NTU];
606  // SU knows nothing about time; this is just for output purposes
607  time = TimeStore[NTU];
608 
609  // should Control vector correction be here???
610 
611  if(doSRISU) {
612  gpstk::Matrix<double> Phi;
613  Phi = inverse(PhiInv);
614  srif.smootherUpdate(Phi,Rw,G,Zw,Rwx);
615  inverted = false;
616  }
617  else {
618  srif.DMsmootherUpdate(Cov,State,PhiInv,Rw,G,Zw,Rwx);
619  }
620 
621  // correct for Control vector
622  if(ControlStore.size() > 0) {
623  gpstk::Vector<double> Control = ControlStore[NTU];
624  if(doSRISU) {
625  srif.shift(PhiInv*Control);
626  }
627  else {
628  State -= PhiInv * Control;
629  }
630  }
631  }
632  catch(gpstk::Exception& e) {
633  e.addText("KSU");
634  GPSTK_RETHROW(e);
635  }
636  }
637 
638  // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
639  // Utilities
640  bool getDoInvert(void) { return doInversions; }
641  void setDoInvert(bool on) { doInversions=on; }
642 
643  bool getDoOutput(void) { return doOutput; }
644  void setDoOutput(bool on) { doOutput=on; }
645 
646  bool isExtended(void) { return extended; }
647  void setExtended(bool ext) { extended=ext; }
648 
649  void setSmoother(bool ext) { smoother=ext; }
650  bool isSmoother(void) { return smoother; }
651 
652  void setSRISU(bool ext) { doSRISU=ext; }
653  bool isSRISU(void) { return doSRISU; }
654 
655  bool isSingular(void) { return singular; }
656 
657  std::string getTag(void) { return msg; }
658  void setTag(std::string tag) { msg = tag; }
659 
660  gpstk::Namelist getNames(void) { return srif.getNames(); }
661  gpstk::Vector<double> getState(void) { return State; }
662  gpstk::Matrix<double> getCovariance(void) { return Cov; }
663 
664  // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
665  // data
666 protected:
668  bool doOutput;
674  bool doInversions;
676  bool singular;
678  bool doSRISU;
680  bool extended;
682  bool smoother;
684  bool inverted;
685 
686  int NTU,NMU,Nstate,Nnoise; // Nnoise is there only for the user
687  // NTU increases with TU, decreases with SU
688  // NMU just counts MUs, mainly for user
689  FilterStage stage;
690  double time;
691  double big,small; // condition number at last inversion
692  std::string msg; // optional tag to put in output (2nd field)
693  gpstk::Vector<double> State;
694  gpstk::Matrix<double> Cov;
695  gpstk::SRIFilter srif;
696  gpstk::Vector<double> PFResid; // valid after MU
697  // store by forward filter, used by backward filter
698  std::map<int, gpstk::Matrix<double> > RwStore, RwxStore, PhiInvStore, GStore;
699  std::map<int, gpstk::Vector<double> > ZwStore, ControlStore;
700  std::map<int, double> TimeStore;
701  // these are different in that there is not a value at every NTU
702  std::map<int, gpstk::Namelist> AddsStore, NamesStore;
703  std::map<int, gpstk::SRI> DropsStore;
704  // when there are adds and drops on the same epoch, the dropped SRI put in Store
705  // must have adds removed from it.
706  gpstk::Namelist dropsNL; // save drops until after TU
707 
708  // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
709 private:
710  // for internal use in constructors and by Reset
711  void initialize(const gpstk::Namelist& NL)
712  {
713  Nstate = NL.size();
714  //Nnoise = Ns; // Nnoise is for the user only
715  NTU = 0;
716  NMU = -1;
717 
718  stage = Unknown;
719 
720  // initialize the SRIF
721  srif = gpstk::SRIFilter(NL);
722  inverted = false;
723 
724  State = gpstk::Vector<double>(Nstate,0.0);
725  Cov = gpstk::Matrix<double>(Nstate,Nstate,0.0);
726 
727  // clear stores
728  RwStore.clear(); RwxStore.clear(); PhiInvStore.clear(); GStore.clear();
729  ZwStore.clear(); ControlStore.clear();
730  TimeStore.clear(); AddsStore.clear(), NamesStore.clear(); DropsStore.clear();
731 
732  dropsNL.clear();
733  }
734 
735  // use to invert the SRIF to get State and Covariance
736  void Invert(const std::string& msg=std::string()) throw(gpstk::Exception)
737  {
738  LOG(DEBUG) << msg;
739  if(!doInversions) return;
740 
741  // get state and covariance
742  try {
743  srif.getStateAndCovariance(State,Cov,&small,&big);
744  singular = false;
745  inverted = true;
746  Nstate = srif.size();
747  }
748  catch(gpstk::Exception& e) {
749  singular = true;
750  e.addText(msg);
751  GPSTK_RETHROW(e);
752  }
753  }
754 
755 }; // end class KalmanFilter
756 
757 #endif
Generated on Sat Mar 22 2014 12:56:47 for GPS ToolKit Software Library by   1.8.4
